{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3222558,"name":"Jacob Caporuscio","username":"Jacob_C","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/97f17d/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-08-02T23:32:54.405Z","cooked":"

We‚Äôre excited to announce Phoenix Pro Season Pass - a way to license your devices for the season with a single license purchase.

Also, some bonus free licenses for off-season purchases so anyone wanting Phoenix Pro for 2024 can get up and running right away!

See our full blog post for details:

CTR Electronics

Phoenix Pro Licensing: Announcing Season Pass

Thank you to everyone who provided feedback on Phoenix Pro and the 2023 Phoenix software from last season. Based on this feedback we‚Äôve been developing several improvements (such as the change to Phoenix 6) and today we have another to share with...

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-02T23:32:54.405Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":595,"reads":977,"readers_count":976,"score":3685.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"Jacob Caporuscio","primary_group_name":"CTRE","flair_name":"CTRE","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/1/b/1bd2b430e1bb6427d1c6504ff6abcd31de851a6d.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":57,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://store.ctr-electronics.com/blog/phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Phoenix Pro Licensing: Announcing Season Pass - CTR Electronics","clicks":546}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":32}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12889,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Engineer at CTR Electronics"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/1","custom_user_title":"Engineer at CTR Electronics","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":32}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":32,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3222581,"name":"","username":"Vasista","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/ccd318/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T00:49:14.125Z","cooked":"

Are there higher tiers of the season pass that will give me unlimited soft drinks and preferred parking?

Sadly no, but if someone can figure out how to do a tier that provides unlimited corndogs I‚Äôm all ears.

What was reasoning behind calling it a ‚Äúseason pass‚Äù over something cooler, maybe like ‚ÄúBattle Pass‚Äù?

Can‚Äôt wait for them to announce loot boxes.

sorry I guess they are called:

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T01:36:31.290Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":811,"readers_count":810,"score":427.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"jedgar6","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":17}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33848,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"9410"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/5","custom_user_title":"9410","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":17}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":17,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222600,"name":"","username":"CYO","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/a88e4f/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T01:57:58.012Z","cooked":"
  • The licensed device is used on a roboRIO configured for one of the reserved ‚ÄúOff-Season Demo‚Äù team numbers (currently team numbers 9970 - 9999)

What happens if you aren‚Äôt assigned one of those numbers for your offseason event?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T01:57:58.012Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":781,"readers_count":780,"score":186.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":40508,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222678,"name":"Clayton Yocom","username":"Clayton_Yocom","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/clayton_yocom/{size}/194737_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T02:43:12.303Z","cooked":"

I‚Äôm sure if you call and explain the situation to CTR they‚Äôll be more than happy to work with you.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T02:43:12.303Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":741,"readers_count":740,"score":213.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"Clayton Yocom","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":40508,"username":"CYO","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/a88e4f/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15041,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Slava Ukraini üá∫üá¶"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/7","custom_user_title":"Slava Ukraini üá∫üá¶","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222692,"name":"Gary Chen","username":"Gary","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/839c29/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T03:14:16.460Z","cooked":"

At least I could try to guess the reason why it don‚Äôt call it Phoenix Pro Max Season Pass LoL. Anyway still love Phoenix, take my money pls.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T03:14:16.460Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":726,"readers_count":725,"score":205.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"Gary Chen","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":34970,"username":"mdurrani834","name":"","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mdurrani834/{size}/131246_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":36334,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222707,"name":"Ari Meles-Braverman","username":"AriMB","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/arimb/{size}/189989_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T11:49:18.229Z","cooked":"

Is the ‚ÄúroboRIO configured for the team number‚Äù via the roboRIO Imaging Tool configuration? Or is there a separate configuration to set the CTRE team number?

Also, how does the authentication process work now? If the license is now for the whole roboRIO instead of individual Falcons I‚Äôd imagine that simplifies the process a fair bit

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T11:49:18.229Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":674,"readers_count":673,"score":169.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"Ari Meles-Braverman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25012,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/9","custom_user_title":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222708,"name":"","username":"crueter","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/crueter/{size}/258043_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T12:23:07.377Z","cooked":"

Jokes aside, this is a great change. I‚Äôm curious how authentication works but assuming it‚Äôs reliable, this is a great deal for teams in the CTRE ecosystem.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T12:23:07.377Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":643,"readers_count":642,"score":138.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50684,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6032 | QDash"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/10","custom_user_title":"6032 | QDash","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222710,"name":"Billfred Leverette (he/him/not Bill)","username":"Billfred","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billfred/{size}/225278_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T12:58:54.558Z","cooked":"

If your off-season event is using FMS Sync to push live results to FRC.events, it will for sure. That‚Äôs part of the deal events agree to.

If they aren‚Äôt doing that, ask nicely?

Source: am off-season event organizer who has always used sync when available

Much better licensing structure than last year, thank you for this.

AriMB:

Is the ‚ÄúroboRIO configured for the team number‚Äù via the roboRIO Imaging Tool configuration?

Yep! No extra team-specific configuration is required beyond what you normally do to set up your control system.

AriMB:

Also, how does the authentication process work now?

Unfortunately we still don‚Äôt have a good way to hardware-license an entire roboRIO - the licenses do still need to be activated per-device, but now you only need a single license purchase for the season to allow the activations.

@Jacob_C

Want to make sure I‚Äôm understanding correctly. If we have a competition robot and a practice robot that we may want to run at the same time (so 2 team numbers), is this two (2) season passes ‚Äì one for each team number ‚Äì or can the practice robot utilize one of the demo numbers (9970 - 9999) so we would need 1 season pass as it would support both our team number and a demo number at the same time?

","post_number":18,"post_type":1,"posts_count":47,"updated_at":"2023-08-03T16:11:19.195Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":14,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":537,"readers_count":536,"score":117.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":439465,"topic_slug":"ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass","display_username":"Joe Witcpalek","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":12889,"username":"Jacob_C","name":"Jacob Caporuscio","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/97f17d/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":29802,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/ctre-phoenix-pro-licensing-announcing-season-pass/439465/18","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3222752,"name":"Jacob Caporuscio","username":"Jacob_C","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/97f17d/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-08-03T16:16:44.475Z","cooked":"

In this scenario (a comp robot and a practice robot running at the same time) you would only need one season pass, assigned to your regular team number.

Devices licensed from that season pass would work with both the regular robot and the robot utilizing one of the demo numbers.
